text: The Addams Family is a group of characters in scary cartoons by Charles Addams. It might also mean: *The Addams Family, a 1964 TV series based on the characters *The Addams Family, a 1973 animated TV series *The Addams Family, a 1991 movie based on the characters *The Addams Family, a 1992 animated TV series *The Addams Family (musical), a dark musical comedy based on the characters, 2009 Chicago tryouts *The Addams Family, a 2019 animated movie based on the characters
title: The Addams Family
